name: Stick-man Hockey Star Skater Fight
description: Not your average game play in this cute stickman hockey game. The stickman ice hockey players are out to kill you. Use your epic ice skating skills to get you to survive the players onslaught. Fun for all ages, boys and girls. Break free from the typical score of ice hockey puck games and try this one out! If you like other stickman games like stickman skateboarding, stickman football, stickman boxing, or any other stickman sports games you will like this one. Stickman fighting games are similar to stickman hockey because your basically fighting in hockey anyway! Better than air hockey games!
